comment: A constant function, with non-lebesgue-measurable domain is a sigma-measurable functions (w.r.t. the Lebesgue measure on the Reals) but it is not a measurable functions ( w.r.t. to ~ df-mbf ). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
